Processing Community Day @Aarhus 2023 Saturday, Sept 30th 10.00–18.00 @DIDAKTEKET Arkitektskolen Aarhus

Program

10.00 PCD Introduction
10.10 Renée Ridgway: Workshop #1. Re:search — Data Visualizations as Transcription Sign up here
12.00 LUNCH
12.45 Intro to presentations
12.55 Honey Biba Beckerlee: Swarm Intelligence
  Arnar Ómarsson: Sedimental Value
13.45 BREAK
14.00 Jussi Parikka: The Environmental Audiotour and Materiality of Data
  Renée Ridgway: Re:search — Terms of Art
14.50 BREAK
15.05 Markus Alexander Mejer Bjerremand & Signe Regin Runge-Dalager: B.E.C.N: Speculating Alternative Data Infrastructures
  Richard Vijgen: The Infosphere and the Technological Sublime
16.00 Richard Vijgen: Workshop #2: Space Weather, a Data Stream from the Future. Sign up here
18.00 PCD @Aarhus 2023 ends!

 

Refreshments will be provided for PCD audiences throughout the day
